Leader raised both hands, and the air around him started to ripple. The snake reformed on the ground and began to grow, elongating its body and increasing in size until it was as large as a whale, it slithered gracefully across the ground, ready to strike.
As guessed, Leader didn't have any kind of weapon, instead he used summon-related abilities, and his only summon was the 'snake', which is why his cult worships these very same snakes he creates.
"GUN DISPLAY!" Leader summoned four pistols behind him, they were floating in the air and all of them had a blueish aura, aimed at Leader, "SHOOT!"
~PIOU, PEW, SHOOT~
All six guns shot dozens upon dozens of bullets toward Leader, whose expression didn't even budge.
"Snake Shield…" he calmly mumbled as he lifted his arms up, summoning another serpent that formed a circle around Leader, creating a transparent barrier that none of the bullets could break through.
And then…
"Serpent Restrain…" he raised one of his feet, then swung it upward.
~FWISH, BIM~
And two very small snakes came out of the ground beside Officer, then began to slowly bind the guy by restraining his legs.
"…SHIT!" Officer stopped shooting his bullets as he aimed them at the snakes, this was very bad news for him.
But this was already over…
"Snake Fury…" Leader pointed at his opponent, and the giant snake that had been resting suddenly got up, launching itself toward Officer, who couldn't move because of the small snakes restraining him below.
"…" he turned his head in the direction of the giant snake and saw its mouth opened, ready to swallow him: it was a terrifying sight as the aura of the snake was everywhere, and it was almost as big as the hallway, its white eyes leaving a small trail behind.
No matter how many bullets he shot at it, it wouldn't disappear.
And so what had to happen happened.
~FWISH, NOM~
Officer was completely annihilated by the snake, and when the giant mouth closed on him, he received enormous damage (even with the domination aura blocking most of it)
"-67382!"
"Cri…mi…nal…" Officer slowly pointed at Leader before falling, his body destroyed from the aura and teeth of the summon.
And so, Officer obviously died.
[A participant has been slain by another player!]
[6 participants remain!]
"…" Leader's face stayed neutral through all of this, and he just snapped his fingers to make all his summons disappear, leaving only the destroyed body of Officer on the ground.
He had gotten his reward after all… who would be his next target?

chapters.title: Chapter 177 - 177: Leader's Next Target
chapters.content:
Only ten minutes after the announcement of another person dying, while Stark was busy fighting off two [Dungeon Lizards] under the watchful gaze of his clone…
A new message appeared.
[The sublevel 2 Floor has been opened! Head to the exit to be able to climb to the next level!]
'Oh…?' was it because of the rewards they had gotten, or maybe it was just that someone got lucky and somehow found the key extremely fast, it hadn't even been more than 30 minutes since they entered this level after all…
The sound of the announcement echoed through the dimly lit dungeon halls for everyone to hear.
The fact it was done so quickly probably meant the person that had opened it was the only one up here now, the rest of the people still busy fighting monsters.
And as expected, after only two minutes since the first announcement…
[Akira has reached the second sublevel first, granting reward…]
'Maybe he got the [Key Location Map], he did get two rewards after all…' Stark thought as he sent a crimson fist toward the last [Dungeon Lizard].
~BOOM~
"-66381!" and so it fell dead on the ground.
[You have slain 'Dungeon Lizard lvl103', gained 153559 EXP!]
[You have slain 'Dungeon Lizard lvl103', gained 154122 EXP!]
'Only one or two monsters…' Stark couldn't contain his excitement: he was level 49, so close to being level 50 and finally being able to unlock his new class, as well as many other features, much like when he reached level 25.
It was kind of anticlimactic to get to level 50 just like that in opposition to having to fight a 'Godless Demon' apostle like last time for his first milestone, but who cares?
'Now I need to figure out the way to the exit…' he didn't have a map, and he had gone pretty far inside the [Dungeon of Fear], so finding his way back wouldn't be possible easily…
[Only two people remain in the third sublevel!]
Plus, it seemed like that most people had already rushed to the second sublevel using their maps after checking the announcement.
But this also meant that… someone else was still there…?
To be honest, Stark already had an idea of who had died and who did it (his clone also confirmed it): Kokoro, Yuri, and Akira wouldn't be possible since they were cautious, plus the latter had opened the second door.
And the white haired lady looked too strong to be taken out like this, which meant the only people remaining were Officer and Leader, and he had a deep feeling that the former was killed by the latter.
'Need to watch out for the sect leader I guess… always had a bad feeling about him,' it was all speculation of course, but it was pretty spot-on.
It didn't matter much though, he would be alone on this floor for a while and would have all the opportunities in the world to get to level 50, then he would become much stronger…!
Even if it wasn't a big fight that got him to this huge milestone, it didn't really matter to him.
[WARNING! If you enter the second sublevel, then the limited offer of getting your map back and TWO rewards will be cancelled, think wisely!]
'Well… not like I'm going to meet anybody as most of them are up, and the last guy must be currently heading to the exit too…' it was sad such a reward would be left out, but he surely wouldn't be able to take this offer currently.
Or at least… that is what he believed.
'I guess there's Yuri, Akira and Leader on the dangerous list now, although I think the first two are much more dangerous by their auras alone-' Stark mumbled while walking.
But…
~FWISH, CROWKA~
He sensed something coming from behind, and when he and his clone turned around, they saw a giant green snake coming at them.
"=)" the clone didn't even budge, keeping its massive smile on its face as it crouched down to avoid the massive snake, and Stark did the same.
'Must be one of the participants,' he immediately thought, 'I remember one of them having a snake at the back of his robe…'
And as expected, it was at this moment that Leader revealed himself, the same expression on his face, almost as if he expected Stark to do that.
But he did: the exact same thing happened with Officer, and it wouldn't change with Stark, who was much weaker.
"Heh~ a sect leader trying to kill someone, should have known, did you do that to Officer?" Stark smiled as widely as his clone, they basically looked like twins.
"…!" Leader for the first time did look slightly surprised, he didn't know how Stark knew, but it was weird.
Plus… what was that thing behind him?
Leader wasn't present when Stark explained about his clone, so to him, this was just… an anomaly, and a scary one at that.
Even he could see it: that thing was twisted and evil, maybe even more so than he himself was as a sect leader.
Leader's sect was called "Snake Symphony", and they all worshiped the snakes that he created, making him somewhat of a god to his followers, who ranged in the thousands.
"I hope you don't regret that decision of yours later," Stark and his clone positioned themselves for combat, with absolutely zero hesitation to kill the guy.
And for some reason… Leader actually hesitated.
He had been completely confident in himself when against Officer, easily taking him down using the usual method he did when killing people weaker than he was, but this time… he felt like it wouldn't work.
Maybe it was those evil smiles that he hesitated, or maybe this aura…?
'…' Leader breathed in before summoning the giant snake as big as a whale in front of him again, 'It's going to work.'
His plan had never failed, why would it not succeed against a kid so weak, he was the last to reach level 50 and last to leave this floor after all, right…?
"I guess that's your decision, then let's start this battle," Stark shrugged.
"=)" the [Superior Clone] looked excited.
[FIGHT!]
'Heh~ guess I shouldn't have talked too soon…' Stark mumbled to himself, after all he had said that this rise to level 50 would be anticlimactic, yet here he was, facing off against the possible strongest enemy he had fought against until now, even stronger than [Judicator], [Sierra], [The Corrupter Ghoul] and [Soulayer]…
"SHOW ME WHAT YOU'VE GOT, SECT LEADER," he smiled as he activated his aura as well.

chapters.title: Chapter 178 - 178: The Unavoidable Combo (Or is it?)
chapters.content:
While all the others had already ascended to the second sublevel of the Lucullus prison, Stark and Leader were now facing one another, with the clear intent to fight and kill the other party.
It had been Leader that attempted to ambush Stark, but now that he was forced to fight, he wouldn't hesitate to take this opportunity to climb to level 50 but also to accept the offer he had been given.
"…" Leader's expression remained neutral as he saw Stark activate his aura, the clone behind him still smiling widely.
Frankly, Leader hated that clone more than any of the other participants, and he didn't know why, something just felt off about it: its eyes, its mouth, and its entire figure, it felt like it could kill him whenever it wanted, but just chose not to for fun.
But of course, he would never show his expression faltering, it was something he learned as a sect leader: always being shown as all powerful with no flaws.
"GET READY, SECT LEADER!" Stark shouted with a smile as he stood his ground.
~FWISH~
Leader on the other hand already had the giant green aura lying in front of him, but he also decided to summon dozens of others that ranged from small to middle-sized, each of them surrounding his body: shoulders, neck, one was on top of his, others around his torso and legs.
"Am I supposed to be impressed," Stark rolled his eyes while activating [Perception], if he so wanted to waste time, then Stark would use it wisely to check out his opponent.
…
[Name: Leader]
[Level: 61]
[Class: Domination]
[HP: 34000]
[Strength: 2938]
[Speed: 5372]
[Stamina: 4314]
[Defense: 5409]
[Skills: Domination, Snake Summoning, Venomous Touch, Ultimate Fusion (MYTHICAL), Serpentine Charge, Reptile Swarm, Serpent Restrain, The Symphony of Snakes, Snaky the Giant Snake, Giant Bite, Attack Frenzy, Snake Shield, Better Summons (PASSIVE)…]
…
'Hm…' his HP were very low, but it was expected as the [Domination] does seem to leave out HP to prioritize skills and stats, meaning that even a hit from Stark would probably only do around 8000 points of damage as the [Domination] aura would block most of it.
As for his general stats, they were insanely good, way better than Stark's and even better than the level 100 people he had fought at the 'ClassiTop Event'…
And of course, he had the [Domination] skill as well as twelve others since he was level 61, meaning that he got one skill every 5 level, much like Stark.
"Reptile Swarm!" was the skill he had used to summon all these snakes around him, and he could send them all to Stark any time.
Meanwhile, the giant (and strongest) snake out of them all that was lying in front of Leader, its eyes never leaving Stark, and its tongue hissing, was from the [Snaky the Snake] skill, and yes, it sounded ridiculous, but that skill is extremely powerful.
"AURA SMASH!" not wanting to do nothing, the [Superior Clone] immediately sent two crimson fists at Leader.
"Snake Shield," but he just used this skill to summon a serpent that circle in front of Leader and formed a giant barrier.
~BOOM, BOOM~
The crimson fists did nothing to the transparent barrier.
"=)" but the [Superior Clone] didn't seem affected.
'Alright… it's time,' Leader had used this method dozens if not HUNDREDS of times against monsters and humans alike: letting them attack first, blocking their attack, and while they are busy anticipating what comes next, he would bind their feet to the ground using another one of his skills then send [Snaky] to deal the final blow.
This was an attack that hadn't failed ONCE, and he would make sure today wasn't the first either, it couldn't be: he was stronger than Stark, and he looked so weak…
'Come on…' his expression was neutral on the outside, but deep inside, he was trembling slightly, it was the first time it happened, and he didn't know why, 'ALRIGHT, LETS GO!'
"SERPENT RESTRAIN…!" just like last time, he raised one of his feet then swung it upward in Stark's direction.
~FWISH, QUWIK~
Two snakes came out of the ground below and attached themselves to his legs, making him unable to escape.
"SERPENT RESTRAIN…!" but he used it twice, this time in the clone's direction to restrain it as well since it could ruin his plans.
"=)" the [Superior Clone] looked down at the small snakes restraining its legs, then back at the original, who looked indifferent to the attack as well.
Not only did he have [Invincible Dodge], but he also had [Dodge Control] available in case anything happened.
"COME ON…" Leader whispered while focusing his entire aura on the snake in front of him, making it get up then sending it at intense speed toward Stark and his clone, it was taking the entire hallway, so normally, avoiding it should be impossible, "IT'S MY WIN…"
~FWISH, GROOWWW~
The giant green snake opened its mouth, big enough to swallow both Stark and his clone in one go, yet none of them looked afraid of that thing.
"…" Stark looked at his clone then made a quick gesture with his head, asking it to do 'that'.
He didn't even plan to waste his [Dodge Control] or [Invincible Dodge] on such a WEAK combo of attacks.
And so…
"DOMI-CHAIN," the [Superior Clone] summoned the crimson chain and sent it toward the giant aura snake, closing its mouth and slowly wrapping itself around it.
"…!" Leader for the first time in months if not years showed signs of legitimate surprise, "KEEP GOING…!" he wanted to shout to his snake.
But…
~FWISH, STOP~
The chain wrapped itself around the snake's mouth, face, and body; making it abruptly stop right before reaching Stark as the chain was absorbing its energy, making it fall to the ground, unable to keep going.
~FWISH, KICK~
Right afterward, Stark and his clone got rid of the small snakes attached to their legs by punching or kicking them.
"MOVE…" Leader ordered [Snaky The Snake] to keep going, but…
[Snaky is unable to move since he is bound, try again later!]
"Well, I'll just summon his back to the space and use him later then…" Leader lifted both his arms with the intent to bring Snaky back to himself, but yet again…
[Snaky is restrained by the 'Domi-Chains', making him unable to come back until the chains are off him!]
"…" Leader was astonished: his most powerful combo had been stopped by a mere chain while his opponents were restrained, and they didn't even seem to care about that, taking it as some sort of weak attack.
[Snaky the Snake] was Leader's second most powerful skill, yet it was now tamed by Chosen, making him unable to control it as long as it was bound.
'…' Leader breathed in and out again, focusing his aura and attention on what he should be doing next, 'It doesn't matter, I'm still stronger…'
He got ready to keep going while using his other skills, after all it wasn't because his most powerful combo had failed that it was the end of the world, it was bound to happen at some point against someone who had the convenient skills to stop it.
But… even when he thought of all of this… the faces of Stark and his clone at that moment, their massive smiles as they saw his surprised look, sent shivers down his spine.

chapters.title: Chapter 179 - 179: Fists vs Snake Summons
chapters.content:
Now that his second powerful skill [Snaky the Snake] was tamed by the crimson chain, Leader could only watch as the other two removed the small snakes that were restraining them and then looked back at him.
His plan has miserably failed simply because Chosen had the PERFECT skills to counter this attack, was it finally karma coming back at him for everything that he did in the real world? Or maybe it was something...?
Maybe... Stark was smarter? No, this couldn't be, he was in control of thousands of people, and they would do anything by a simple request, a child like him cannot be smarter...
'These smiles...' he silently gritted his teeth internally, 'You dare show such an expression in front of an all-powerful being...' Leader truly believed he was some sort of god because of the constant cheers and praises from his followers.
"CRIMSON SPEARS," Stark and his clone summoned six spears and threw them all toward the enemy.
"SNAKE SHIELD!" but it seemed like that skill of his had no limitations, as the snake just circled him again and created the transparent barrier that deflected all the spears.
"=)" Stark looked at his clone, and it just lightly pointed its head at Leader.
"..." Stark thought about the implications of the clone's suggestion, but it was too risky, especially when Leader was almost as fast if not faster than them, plus he had the [Venomous Touch] skill, which surrounded his entire body with poison that could deal damage over time if they even as much as grazed him.
This could be deadly to his clone as it only had around 500 HP left...
But there was a solution to that very same problem he was facing, and although it was risky, he did think that it was for the best.
"HP Transfer..." he sighed as he pointed at himself, a green trail of aura appearing at the tip of his index finger, then he pointed at his clone, "Send."
~FWISH~
The trail of aura shot at the clone, and it hit it straight on as it didn't avoid it, after all why would it when it was the original that did that?
[+10000 HP to Superior Clone]
He had given around half his life to the clone, but it was needed if they wanted to battle someone who constantly fought with hundreds of small snakes that could poison you.
[Stark HP: 12300/22300]
"VENOMOUS TOUCH," sensing the increase in their auras, Leader immediately activated one of his passive skills, which made it so that his body is poison itself: if Stark or his clone punched him, then they would receive the [Poison] status for a minute.
And then, without wasting time...
"SERPENTINE CHARGE!" he yet again used the skill he had used first to ambush both Officer and Stark.
He pointed his arm at Stark with his palm facing them, then a giant magic circle appeared around a huge chunk of the hallway.
~FWISH, FWIIISHH.... VIOUM~
And as expected, a giant green snake came out of the magic circle, vertically rushing at the two enemies with its mouth open.
"SNAKE RESTRAIN," plus, he yet again attempted to restrain the two Stark with his skill, summoning two small snakes that were ready to bind their legs again.
'A sect leader that doesn't even think...?' Stark was confused, there was no way he truly believed that this would work, right?
I mean, he did watch the fight Stark had against Soulayer, so he should have at least been able to identify some of his skills...?
"INVINCIBLE DODGE," both Stark and the [Superior Clone] activated their skill to roll away, fazing through the small snakes and also the giant one, dealing 0 damage as it exploded against the wall behind them.
"...?" Leader was surprised: his attack had surely hit them, but it literally just went through them like it was air, "...!" that's when he remembered something like this did happen with Stark before, but he was so focused on sending everything at them that he didn't realize it.
Leader was losing his patience, and Stark's arsenal seemed to be highly focused on countering/blocking/dodging for some reason, which was his PERFECT counter...
"AURA SMASH," Stark and his clone sent four crimson fists at Leader, who immediately activated [Snake Shield].
But this time...
~BOOM, CRACK~
A very small crack formed at the corner of the shield, almost invisible to most, but Leader knew this was bad: his shield wasn't invincible, it just had 500,000 HP, if these went down, it would be destroyed and would take 12 hours to reconstruct it.
And right now...
[Snake Shield HP: 312821/500000]
It was almost half destroyed by the spears and crimson fists the two Stark were constantly sending.
'You little...' Leader began to grit his teeth, losing his temper as everything he sent would be countered by those two fuckers.
But he couldn't give up yet…
"REPTILE SWARM," he opened his arms widely, and dozens upon dozens of snakes began to materialize around him: some were in the front, others behind, some on his body and the rest even on the walls and ceiling, but they were all looking at Stark, their eyes glowing with red aura as they got ready to all attack at once.
Getting rid of so many enemies would seem hard, and if they were bitten by a dozen of them, they would be paralyzed and killed.
So what could they possibly do...?
...
[Skill: Reptile Swarm]
[Description:] Summons 300 snakes (increases with skill level) that all attack the enemy at once, each of them only have one hp, but it is hard to get rid of them all.
[Flaw:] 'They all attack at ONCE'.
...
"=)" Stark's clone didn't have to read the flaw that it already figured out how to win this battle.
"...!" but Stark also figured it out as well, and so he just looked at his clone, asking it to do it instead of him.
"Go, my minions...!" Leader pointed at the Stark, and all 300 snakes rushed at them with the full intent to eat them both alive.
But...
~FWISH~
The [Superior Clone] drew a big circle on its palm, then pointed at the ceiling right in front of them, absolutely confident its plan would work.
"HEAVEN'S WRATH," the crimson glow appeared in the sky to announce the fact the beam was powering up.
Stark and his clone had perfectly calculated the moment the beam would erupt, so they just stood there, looking at Leader with big smiles on their faces.
'Why aren't they moving...' for the first time, Leader sweat a bit, 'Anyone who saw my reptiles would usually try to run or fight them off, but I would always kill them while they were distracted... WHY AREN'T THEY RUNNING?!'
"=)"
"=)"
And when the small snakes were about to reach them, the entirety of them concentrated in one simple area as they had all been ordered to reach for the boys…
~FWISH… BOOOOOOM~
The giant crimson beam descended upon all of them at once.
"SsSSsss…"
"Sss-"
"…"
Each and every single one of the snakes was INSTANTLY vaporized by the attack.
And so, while the giant crimson beam was still descending, hiding Stark and his clone from the unsuspecting Leader, he suddenly had a bright idea.
"It's our time to attack now, we've been on the defensive for long enough," he smiled, and the clone nodded.
He immediately put his plan into action.
"CRIMSON BALL TRANSMISSION!"

chapters.title: Chapter 180 - 180: The Ultimate Fusion
chapters.content:
Stark had been attacked by Leader around four times, while all he and his clone did was dodging all the attacks he sent at them, since they REALLY wanted him to despair.
Since the moment they saw him and his calm expression, they instantly knew that guy thought himself superior to all of them since he probably had power and influence in the outside world.
But Leader had forgotten just one simple thing: the outside world doesn't matter during the 'Domination Trial', you can be the king of a country, a president, a CEO, but you would still get killed if you didn't fight with all your might.
Plus, they knew from that simple combo with [Snake Restrain] and [Snaky the Snake], as well as his expression after they avoided it that this was probably what he did against all his other opponents, yet it somehow didn't work against Stark and his clone since… well… they weren't dumb?
And after four attacks, it was apparent that Leader was slightly panicking, although he kept his neutral expression on the outside, his aura was more shaky and less confident than before.
~BOOM~
The crimson beam that eliminated all 300 snakes was still there, separating Stark and Leader, while also keeping them hidden as it was impossible to see through the beam.
And so… Stark decided to take advantage of this opportunity to finally attack and end this battle.
"CRIMSON BALL TRANSMISSION!" he summoned the crimson ball in his hand, then immediately threw it.
The ball couldn't be damaged while it was in the air, so it passed right through the beam, and thanks to [Focus], Stark had perfectly been able to aim for where he wanted to: right behind Leader.
The ball lobbed above the sect leader, who was too focused using [Snake Summoning] to create new snake allies, so he didn't even notice it flying above him, then swiftly falling.
"Stay back here," Stark smiled at his clone, and it nodded.
And then… before the ball even reached the ground, while it was still falling, now around Leader's waist…
Stark snapped his fingers.
~SNAP, FWISH~
Stark's body disappeared from its original spot and a trail of crimson aura went a lightning speed toward the spot the ball was currently in, resulting in Stark teleporting right behind Leader.
The transmission was almost instantaneous and made no noise, so there was no way for Leader to know…
And he didn't, at least… not until it was too late.
"DOMI-CHAIN!" Stark could have obviously dealt a good amount of damage by immediately attacking, but it would be dumb as he could definitely guarantee his victory if he just played it safe.
~SCWING, BIND~
The crimson chain headed toward Leader, who immediately sensed that something was wrong and turned around.
But…
~FWISH~
All he saw the Stark's fist in front of his face, and he could do nothing to block this attack as [Snake Shield] couldn't be activated this fast from this close…
"URGHHH!" Leader subconsciously tried to block the fist with his own, but the force was too strong. The blow sent him flying backward, slamming into the ground and almost entering the area of [Heaven's Wrath].
"-9382!" when [Domination] aura clashed against [Domination] user, then the amount of damage would be massively reduced, which was why [Domination] were always some of the greatest to ever occur.
"SNAKE SUMMONING!" Leader summoned two snakes in his hands and used their teeth to stop himself from entering the giant beam, and he actually succeeded at the last second, his legs on the verge of being vaporized.
But of course… the fact Stark hit Leader could only mean one thing…
[You have received the 'Poisoned' effect for one minute (100 damage per second)]
The [Poison] effect would obviously do 6000 damage; and thankfully enough he had more than enough HP to survive this, but it was still very annoying.
'…' Leader tried to take a step forward to stop Stark but… 'Huh?'
He hadn't noticed the chain since had deliberately punched him at that exact moment to divert his attention, meaning that the chain was already up to his knees, and carefully rolling around him.
'I can't move, shit…' Leader immediately used [Giant Bite] and summoned two semi-sized snakes roughly the size of his legs, then ordered them to bite off the chains.
But… when he thought he was free since the chains did come out once the snake bit them… something else appeared behind him, someone much more powerful than anything he had ever felt before.
The beam had already disappeared by this point, and Stark's clone didn't remain idle, after all they had a plan since the moment Stark teleported, and it was going perfectly.
"AURA SMASH… MERGE," Stark's clone immediately began to charge up the attack once Stark went away, taking a long time to gather all its aura inside the giant fist, making it more powerful than before.
And once the beam disappeared and [Superior Clone] noticed Leader was struggling to remove the chains… he shot the giant fist, roughly 1,5x times the size of Leader, toward him.
"SNAKE SHIE-" Leader turned around and immediately summoned his shield again, but… it was too slow.
~FWISH, BOOM~
"-14281!" the damage was incredible for something against a [Domination] user, and it meant that Leader was now at his final 6000 points of health.
"Gurh~" Leader stumbled slightly, the attack making him feel intense pain, and blood pouring out from his eyes and mouth.
He genuinely couldn't understand how he was losing against such a weak kid.
"HOW… HOW… HOOOOOOW~" he suddenly shouted out of nowhere, completely leaving his normal and composed self behind, his face full of fury.
He was surrounded by a huge amount of green aura, and in addition to that…
~FWISH~
His hair, normally long and black, suddenly began to turn completely green, and scales began to appear on his face, his pupils dilating and transforming into a yellow color resembling those of a snake.
"SSSSssssTOPPPP~" he hissed while speaking, his tongue also transformed, it wasn't human anymore.
And once all of this shit was over…
"ULTIMATE FUSION!!!" he activated his [Mythical] skill, which was pretty much his ultimate.
Basically… Leader had turned into some sort of snake man.
"Heh~" Stark found this transformation ridiculous, but couldn't deny it looked strong.
"=)" the clone on the other hand just pointed at Leader and laughed while holding its forehead.
This time, it would truly be the end of Stark's first fight against another [Domination] user.

chapters.title: Chapter 181 - 181: Leader's MYTHICAL Skill
chapters.content:
"ULTIMATE FUSION… REPTILE MODE!" Leader had pretty abandoned much his calm expression, now staring at Stark and his clone like they were his biggest enemies ever, which they probably were, not going to lie.
His long hair that reached his knees went from black to completely green, with snake coming out of it, and his body also began to develop scales on it, plus his eyes looked like those of a serpent ready to attack, basically... his past body had been left behind, almost as if he was reborn.
Also, both his arms and legs were now completely surrounded by dozens of snakes, making it very disturbing as the serpents were swirling all around him, he was their master after all.
"Get ready to be ssstopped…" Stark saw a snake tongue coming out of his mouth whenever he said the letter 's'.
…
[Skill: Ultimate Fusion (MYTHICAL)]
[Description: Fuses with his snake summons to become one big 'snake-man' himself, granting him a boost in strength and making his attacks more poisonous and powerful]
[Flaw: none, you just have to beat him up]
…
'Hm…' Stark didn't quite like this transformation, but he couldn't do much about it.
"=)" and of course, the [Superior Clone] wasn't even bothered as it literally laughed in Leader's face, amused by its attempt to win.
"GET READY YOU SSSSTUPID FUCKER…" Leader dashed in the clone's direction.
"=D" but the clone didn't even take him seriously.
"ATTACK FRENZY," Leader's eyes glew with a yellow color as he sent his snake-filled fist toward the clone.
~FWISH~
But it just avoided it by moving its head to the side, the smile on its face growing wider as it immediately attempted to take him by striking his legs.
"SNAKE SUMMONING!" But Leader was ready and summoned five snakes in front of the attack, causing the clone to stumble and fall to the ground instead.
"=)" the clone now on the ground, looked up to Leader with the same sadistic smile.
"SERPENTINE CHARGE," Leader also smiled this time as he pointed his arm toward the clone, the giant circle looking much more complicated and powerful than before.
And from that distance, not even one meter, then this attack would surely hit and kill the clone.
"Goodbyeeessss, BITCH!" he activated his attack and the giant snake began to come out, its mouth wide open.
But…
"Tsk, tsk, tsk," Stark, who was right behind, shook his head, "A sect leader shouldn't swear!"
"TARGET MANIPULATION," he didn't want to use [Domi-Chain] yet, so instead he opted for another skill that he didn't use much in battles.
~FWISH~
He pointed his right arm at the enemy, his index and middle finger raised at Leader like a gun, a deep aura concentrated on them.
And then… his aura was shot toward Leader, hitting him and making his entire body surrounded by a small outline of crimson color.
"GOT YOU…"
And so right before he could summon his snake to kill the [Superior Clone]…
~FWISH, SNAP~
Stark turned his 'gun' hand to the right, resulting in Leader being slightly sent to the direction he pointed at.
~SSSSSS, BOOOM~
Leader sent the giant snake, but as his body swayed to the left, his arm and circle did as well, meaning that it missed the clone by a hair's length.
"WHAT THE?" he turned to see Stark pointing his arm at him, and that's when he noticed that he had been controlled by Stark's aura… which made him even more furious, "YOU FUCKING AsSSSSHOL-"
He tried to swear but…
~PUNCH, SLAM~
The [Superior Clone] immediately took advantage of that to get up and hit Leader in the face, sending him flying toward Stark.
"-4837!" didn't do much damage because of his snake-man form, but it was still good.
['Superior Clone' has received the [Poisoned] status for 1 minute]
The fact that for every 5000 points of damage, the enemy would receive 6000, frankly made it extremely unfair, but oh well.
"AURA SMASH," Stark focused his aura and sent three crimson fists toward Leader who was repeatedly hitting the ground after being hit.
"SNAKE SHIELD…" but even while being hit, he still activated his shield and tanked all three attacks.
~CRACK~
More cracks began to form on the shield, though.
Meanwhile, [Snaky the Giant Snake] was still unconscious because of the [Domi-Chain] aura, meaning that it was just lying there almost in the middle of the hallway, taking lots of space as they were forced to fight only on one side of it.
It did advantage Stark and his clone though as they were fighting from close range while throwing projectiles…
"CRIMSON SPEARS," then Stark and the clone, as if they had linked minds, both threw six spears at Leader from different directions.
"ARGH, SHIT…" Leader was enraged as he immediately got up, "SNAKE SHIELD… EXPAND!"
Obviously Stark wasn't the only one who could use perks, all other people had some too, and 'expand' was one of the perks of the [Snake Shield].
~BOOM, CRACK~
The [Snake Shield] would grow in size, forming a giant circle around Leader to completely protect him from any attacks.
But this also made it easier to damage the shield, which was why he hadn't activated it.
[Snake Shield HP: 98392/500000]
[Leader HP: 5500/34000]
"ULTIMATE FUSION… HEAL!" he used the second perk of his mythical skill, and most of the snakes that were on his body suddenly bit any part of his body they could reach, inflicting him with their poison.
But in this case…
[+10000HP], instead of being poisoned, since he was a snake-man himself, he had been healed.
"Spatial Inventory," while Leader was busy getting healed, Stark pulled out his inventory void and grabbed three [Crystal Stun] potions from it.
Oh, and yeah, Stark is always under the effect of the [Strength] and [Speed] potions, since he always makes sure to drink some before being in battle.
"CRIMSON BALL TRANSMISSION," the clone sent a ball, landing it right next to Stark, then snapped its fingers to teleport right next to the original.
"Here," he handed two of the three stun potions to it, and it just smiled as it knew perfectly what they needed to do.
The [Crystal Stun] potions didn't work against the [Cyclop] or monsters that were too big or immune, but against a simple human that was affected by it like any other…? It was extremely deadly.
Maybe Leader was immune to it, who knows, after all he had the body of a snake, and he was also immune to poison and many status effects, so you could never know.
But… Stark just a gut feeling that this was THE solution to end this battle.
And so… Stark and his clone took a step forward, their potions in hand as they were ready to eliminate the sect-leader once and for all.
But of course… the other guy didn't stand doing nothing after being healed…
Instead…
"SYMPHONY OF SNAKES!" he used the final skill he hadn't used yet, and also probably the second strongest beside [Snake Fusion] since it was legendary…
And so just like that, both parties were ready to give it everything they've got to end the battle.
The winner takes all: rewards, levels and confidence, while the loser just dies.

chapters.title: Chapter 182 - 182: Symphony Of Snakes
chapters.content:
"SYMPHONY OF SNAKES," Leader was tired of being played with, he had always been respected and worshiped by his followers, and even those outside his cult were always fearful of his powers since they didn't know he was a [Domination] user.
Even among [Domination] users and classifiers, he had always been super strong, being able to take most of them down using his simple combo he did every time, and when he felt bored, he wouldn't use it and instead torture them with his poison.
Basically… he liked to torment people and show them they never stood a chance to begin with.
But doesn't that remind you of someone else… isn't that just like… Stark?
No… he was just… an inferior version =).
…
[Skill: Symphony Of Snakes]
[Rank: Legendary]
[Description: By using the powerful aura of the 'Snake Guardian' to support his body, the user transforms into a new form. In the new form, the transformed user is capable of summoning and controlling hundreds of snakes, whose bodies become an extension of his own.]
[Note: This skill adapts to all other skills!]
…
"ASSsssHOLE!" Leader got up, some blood apparent on his face as he had been hit by Stark's powerful aura fists twice already, as well as the merged [Aura Smash].
And now that he had activated his most powerful legendary skill, while using [Ultimate Fusion]'s reptile form… he was unstoppable.
As if proving his point, [Symphony of Snakes] instantly activated.
Leader's body started to swell, hundreds of snakes poured from the ground, walls, and ceiling to connect to his snake-man form to create a single, massive entity.
"DO YOU SsssEE WHY YOU ARE GOING TO LOSsssE NOW?" Leader looked down upon Stark.
He was now just as tall as the [Sub-Level 4 Guards], although it was just that his entire figure was made up of snakes, now that he himself grew, which meant that his head was just as small as before.
";D" the [Superior Clone] couldn't help but laugh while slapping its knees, the fact Leader was controlling such a massive body completely made out of visible snakes, while his head remained just as small, looked frankly ridiculous.
But Leader was in no mood to be mocked, "YOU SssshALL NOT Laugh! THIS IS A BATTLE OF LIFE AND DEATH HAVE YOU FORGOTTEN THAT?"
~FWISH~
He extended his arm toward the clone, and like some sort of shotgun, dozens of snake were sent toward it.
"=)" but it just moved to the size to avoid the snakes, which all died once separated from the main body.
[Symphony of Snakes] was a skill of course, but its form by itself could result in hundreds of different attacks Leader could send.
~SMASH~
Leader then smashed the ground using his snakes, and a massive crater was left there, almost completely breaking the floor.
"YOU WILL DIE TODAY!"
"AURA SMASH, CRIMSON SPEARS," Stark and his clone yet again sent all of their attacks toward Leader, who used the now massive shield to block them all.
~BOOM, CRACK, CRACK…~
The shield was now almost completely destroyed, but Leader was in such a frenzy state that he didn't even notice, too focused on eliminated the humans.
[Snake Shield HP: 21921/500000]
~STOMP, STOMP~
It looked like Leader didn't REALLY know how to control this form though, he was struggling to take a few steps, and all his attacks…
~FWISH, VIOUM~
No matter how many he sent…
"Haha," even Stark laughed as Leader missed a 'Snake Shot' while he didn't move.
~BOOM, AVOID~
They were just not hitting.
"Probably the skill he got at level 60…" Stark could easily guess this, no one could be a pro at using a skill instantly after all, not even he was this good.
"SsssTOPPPPP THISsss BULLSsssHIIT!!!" Leader was getting angrier.
But…
Stark and his clone had enough fun, as they instantly stopped laughing.
They looked at one another before nodding.
And then…
"DOUBLE ASSAULT!" they both activated their skill, rushing at Leader for the final push and then beginning to run around him at a crazy speed, leaving crimson trails behind them.
[9 seconds remain for 'Double Assault']
"AURA SMASH!" the first thing they did was for the clone to send all three of his fists toward the giant Leader.
Meanwhile…
"AURA SMASH… MERGE!" while that was happening, and while still running circles around the giant snake-man, Stark focused his aura in his right hand, combining all three fists into one.
[8 seconds remain for 'Double Assault']
"SNAKE SHIELD," Leader, thinking he could easily deflect the attacks, activated his giant shield and got ready for impact.
But…
~BOOM, CRACK… BOOOM!~
When all three fists hit, the transparent shield that had been protecting him all this time suddenly exploded, with no way to get it back now as it would take at least 12 hours for him to be able to use it again since it was the cooldown for such a powerful defensive skill.
"YOU LITTLE…" Leader realized too late that his shield had been broken, then he immediately tried to punch the clone with one of his 'snake arms', sending it at intense speed toward it.
But… this was exactly what they wanted.
"=)" the clone kept smiling as it slowly pointed one of his fingers toward the other direction.
"…?" Leader turned his small head in the direction the clone pointed, and he saw… a giant fist, half the size of his giant snake torso, rushing at him.
"AURA SMASH… MERGE!" Stark had used the distraction from his clone as well as the destruction of the shield to use this attack himself.
And it hit.
~BOOOOM~
It hit Leader's torso, which was what Stark aimed for since the head was too small.
And…
"-13382," this would usually be enough to kill, but [Symphony of Snakes] and [Ultimate Fusion] blocked damage really well even without a shield.
[6 seconds remain for 'Double Assault']
But of course, both Stark and his clone knew of the possibility their plan wouldn't totally kill Leader, so they immediately looked at one another and in less than a fraction of a second created a second plan.
Both their minds were linked as if they were one, which was pretty obvious since the clone was made of Stark's aura.
'ALRIGHT, LET'S DO THIS,' Stark pointed at Leader, a crimson mist still around him, it was the after effect of the merged crimson fist after being used while [Double Assault] is active.
And so, taking advantage of that…
"CRIMSON SPEARS," both Stark sent the spears in Leader's directions while beginning to run in circles around the giant snake-man again.
"NO…!" but as if sensing those attacks, Leader just swung his giant arms in the directions of the spears, destroying them all in the process as the snake took all the hits, so he received zero damage.
"Alright, I think we've had enough fun," Stark smirked.
"=)" the clone also put one [Crystal Stun] potions in each of his hands.
This was their final plan: using those three potions to destroy Leader.
He only needed one or two more attacks to be defeated, that was true, and he honestly kind of looked defenseless right now since he was so panicked: nothing like this had ever happened before.
HE was the one humiliating people, yet this time… he felt like HE was the one being toyed with by Stark and the clone.
And the worst feeling of all… was that he also felt like he couldn't do anything about it, all he could try was to keep attacking and fight as long as he could.
But this time…
"=)"
"…"
They weren't playing anymore, so they just got ready to throw all the potions at Leader.
Starting the final plan: Operation Stun-Chain!
[4 seconds remain for 'Double Assault']
[Finish him quick =)!]

chapters.title: Chapter 183 - 183: The Fall of Leader
chapters.content:
[4 seconds remain for 'Double Assault']
Stark and his clone, seeing that Leader was going on a frenzy swinging his 'snake' arms everywhere, which sent hundreds upon hundreds of snakes in all direction, knew they needed to get this over with quickly.
They had already lost enough precious time, and the others must have already leveled up a lot, and possibly already are on the verge of finding the key to the next exit, so he needed to be quick and catch up to them.
And the only thing blocking his advance… was Leader.
[But of course… he wasn't a threat to begin with =)]
"YOU PIEECCsssES OF SsssHIT…" the sect-leader that a far cry from his usual composed self, and Stark could only laugh as he imagined the usually confident Leader talk to his religious followers in the crazed state he was in.
If he had his phone, he would have surely recorded it, but now all he needed was to eliminate him.
'Operation Stun-Chain… BEGIN!' he gave a thumps up to his clone, and both of them began to run around Leader again, who repeatedly, at incredible speed, began to smash all his surroundings.
The movements of both parties were so fast you wouldn't be able to see them by your naked eye.
[3 seconds remain for 'Double Assault'], and only one second had passed as Stark had made at least 4 turns around Leader.
"GO!" he shouted, and his clone immediately backed away.
~FWISH, VIOUM…~
And then… he threw the two [Crystal Stun] potions he had in hand toward Leader.
"…!" but the long-haired man had heard the signal, and also noticed the movements of the clone and the potions, so he obviously knew he couldn't allow them to hit his body or face directly.
And so…
"NICsssE TRY!" he used one of his giant snake arms to block both potions, who exploded on it upon impact.
~CRACK, BOOM~
The potions released the white mist on Leader's arm, and suddenly…
[Leader's right arm was stunned!]
His arm was made of semi-living snakes that Leader had summoned from who knows where, so it meant that they were also affected by the arrow, and the mist spreads extremely easily, resulting in Leader's right arm to be completely infected, and thus stunned.
~CRASH~
Hundreds of snakes fell unconscious on the floor when Leader couldn't attack with that arm anymore, letting it hang there as it would be useless for a while.
"AURA SMASH, CRIMSON SPEARS," and to add to that pressure, the clone kept sending projectiles toward Leader, who was forced to block using his left arm as to not receive damage.
"SERPENTILE CHARGE," he summoned not ONE, but TWO giant green circles, one for each enemy he had.
~VIOUM… PAW!~
The dark green snakes that came out of the giant circles, their eyes full of whitish aura that left a trail behind, were much bigger and powerful than any other one Leader had sent before.
'Emotions do matter in the usage of aura, it seems…' Stark thought as he saw that, it had been true that Leader got stronger the angrier he got.
Was it why his clone was so strong? Or maybe… something else?
In the end, it didn't matter much.
~BOOM~
The snakes, at least five times the size of the two humans (well just one to be honest), rushed at them both, ready to kill them in one strike.
But…
"INVINCIBLE DODGE!" they both rolled away at the last second.
[Perfect Dodge x2!]
They both got a perfect dodge, and it even showed it on the panel with the x2 sign.
[In the case of a double 'Perfect Dodge', time moves much slower than before!]
And just as expected, instead of being able to see Leader's body slowly go up after the attack, it was now so slow that the movements wouldn't be visible if you didn't REALLY focus on them.
But this also meant that Stark could get more time to think.
Well… he didn't really need it tho since… operation 'Stun-Chain' was going exactly as expected, actually it was going even better.
"=)" the clone now just stared at Stark, its expression so sadistic that even he could feel how some of the others felt when seeing it.
It just looked at Stark, after all it didn't have anything else to do: the plan now completely depended on what Stark did.
And so… he decided to finish it.
"CRIMSON BALL TRANSMISSION," there was only a five minutes cooldown between each ball, so he already got it again and summoned it in hand.
~FWISH~
The world retrieved its normal colors (since perfect dodge turns it to black and white), and time began to move normally again.
But instantly…
~FWISH, THROW~
Stark threw the crimson ball perfectly, and [Focus] actually aided him as much as possible this time, even going as far as drawing the perfect line which he needed to throw the ball at.
And so… he did it.
The crimson ball perfectly lobbed over Leader's body while he was still trying to throw attacks at Stark and his clone, which they all avoided even though it was becoming harder and harder to do so.
"WITH THIS…" Stark's aura took over his entire body, hiding his figure by surrounding it by crimson aura, with only his eyes and mouth being white, making him look like his creepy clone, although his expression was totally serious, "IT'S OVER!"
~SNAP~
He snapped his fingers when the ball was right behind Leader's head, and he already positioned himself to throw his potion from the location he was in.
~FWISH~
He instantly teleported behind Leader, now able to see his small head from behind as it was normally mostly covered by the snakes and his giant body.
"Good fight," Stark acknowledge Leader's strength before the fight even ended, this was just how confident he was in his final attack, "You were strong."
~THROW~
As said before, he had already positioned himself to throw the potion, and so the exact moment he teleported, he was already in the position to throw the [Crystal Stun] potion, which he did immediately.
And it hit Leader's head.
~BOOM, CRACK~
"H-HUH?!" Leader looked back to see Stark smiling while floating in midair, "I GOT YOU NOW!"
He moved his left arm and threw a massive fist that would surely kill and poison Stark if it hit.
But right at that moment…
"Huh… I… can't move my body?" he couldn't move his fist, or any of his body parts at all in that regard, resulting in the attack not hitting Stark, who just fell to the ground and landed graciously.
[Leader has been stunned!]
"DOMI-CHAIN!" the final part of the plan was executed, and Stark threw the massive crimson chain around Leader's body while he was stunned, and all he could do was watch in horror as the chain wrapped itself around his legs, then his torso, then his arms… and after less than thirty seconds… his head.
"N-NO, PLEASE, NO STOP, I-" Leader was now begging for mercy, something he had never given to any of his opponents, something he himself loved to hear from his enemies.
And now… he was put in such a lowly position.
"Pathetic," Stark shook his head as Leader's entire body was taken over by the chain, his aura and life force being absorbed.
And now that he couldn't do anything…
[Leader was knocked out]
The [Ultimate Fusion] skill as well as the [Symphony of Snakes] both deactivated, resulting in both the giant snake body to disappear into thin air, but also his original one to transform back to its human form.
And so Leader fell to the ground from that height, while his aura was deactivated.
~CRASH, THUD~
He splashed onto the ground in a sickening thud.
"-99999!"
And so, just like that, Leader, the all-powerful sect-leader, died.
********
Hey guys, Webnovel gave me some kind of reward since I've been uploading chapters for 2 months straight, and I can basically share it with you all:
Go on your profile on the phone app, go down and click on redeem, then put this code: ABDHYUWR2G6WH5JYB
There are 10 uses and you get 10 fast passes that you can use on any novel (or mine lol) to be able to read for completely free :D!

chapters.title: Chapter 184 - 184: Level 50 Reached
chapters.content:
Stark stood there for a moment, taking everything in.
He had done it, he had defeated Leader, the one that tried to kill him first, the one that had probably killed Officer as well… he did it.
The body of Leader lay there, his opened eyes void of any life essence, as falling from such a height caused his organs to be crushed, especially since being knocked out deactivated his aura.
"=)" the [Superior Clone] was celebrating by doing random moves, the sadistic smile on its face not disappearing even for a single second, and its white eyes now leaving the corpse.
It was waiting for Stark to do something.
"Sigh…" this was the first time Stark actually killed a human.
The first two times were during a [Deathless] duel, so nobody had truly died, but this time… he had really done it, he was a murderer, even though it was complete self-defense.
But the thing that bothered Stark the most… was that he didn't even care.
"You're dead…" he mumbled as he began walking toward the corpse, "And I didn't feel anything… not even a thrill."
He looked down on Leader, his eyes completely serious and with no mercy visible in them.
Then he crouched down, inspecting the body of Leader.
Of course, he didn't care much to leave it here, as it would surely get eaten or destroyed by the other beasts.
But the thing he REALLY wanted was…
"I knew it…" Stark smiled just as sadistically as his clone, after all that thing had to get its personality from someone, right?
In Stark's hand was a weird spray-like item with some green liquid inside of it.
[Monster Scent: Upon usage, all monsters will ignore you as they recognize you as their own, even if you kill many of them, this lasts ten minutes, one time use]
As expect, Leader was the one that killed Officer, and so Stark was able to get the item since he didn't have anywhere to hide it, and didn't use it beforehand.
"Spatial Inventory," he put the [Monster Scent] right next to his [Revive Token].
But of course, that wasn't all… no… this was only the beginning.
Because…
[A participant has been slain by a player!]
The notification appeared for everyone to read, and it wouldn't be heard to figure out that he was the one who did it since he and Leader had been the only ones left behind… but it didn't matter, he didn't care about that.
Instead… another panel appeared before him, a panel that brought intense pleasure and hope to Stark.
[You have slain 'Leader lv62', gaining 3,492,221 EXP!]
'…!?' Stark was astonished by the sheer amount of experience he had gotten.
Was killing a [Domination] user always this profitable? And if so… then wouldn't hunting other users be the best way to increase your level?
Stark shook his head, he couldn't let such desires take over him, after all, if he did that, then the [Superior Clone] would detect it and probably immediately go on a rampage.
Anyway, killing Leader granted him the most amount of experience he had gotten at once, even more so than Soulayer and the Corrupted Ghoul.
And this could only mean one thing…
~DING, DING, DING~
He was surrounded by the golden aura thrice.
[Your level has increased to level 50, granting you three skill points and a boost in stats]
[Your level has increased to level 51, granting you three skill points and a boost in stats]
[Your level has increased to level 52, granting you three skill points and a boost in stats]
[Experience: 702242/1348000]
Of course, removing the fact that he had actually climbed up to level 50, Stark noticed that the amount of 'skill points' he was getting increased to three instead of two.
Would they keep going by one every 25 or so levels? If yes then that's great!
[Skill Points: 22 Available!]
He had more enough skill points to upgrade a bunch of his skills, that was great, but for now…
~DING, DING, DING… DING~
Many panels appeared around Stark, there were so many that he was actually surrounded by them, blocking his view.
'Let's take it in order…' Stark smiled, "Oh yeah, can you defend me?" he asked the [Superior Clone] who just mischievously smiled as it positioned itself to fight whoever or whatever came in its view.
'Alright… first of all…' he turned his eyes toward the first panel that had appeared.
And it was…
[Level 50 Reached: please pick a card!]
'Heh, of course,' Stark nodded as the usual three cards appeared-…?
'Huh?' Stark squinted his eyes, as if not understanding.
There weren't three cards displayed in front of him, but FIVE, each in a crimson color with two eyes staring at him, a visible vortex of darkness in them, that was the back of the card.
"Hey, clone, help me out!" he asked his clone for aid as it just killed a [Dungeon Lizard], and it immediately rushed toward Stark, "Please check the drawings behind the cards and tell me which is the best…"
"=)!" it nodded its head and went behind the five cards.
And after a few seconds… it pointed at the one to the far right.
Stark immediately grabbed it, he actually fully trusted his clone since it had no reason to lie, even though it was insanely twisted and evil.
And when he turned the card… he saw the drawing that always represented the skill: this time it was a pair of eyes with the text "EGO" written under them.
Yes, this was all.
"This is the skill you picked?" although this was the first time text was written on one, it was weird his clone picked this one…
"=)" the [Superior Clone] just shrugged as it pointed at a second card.
"…?" weirdly enough, none of the cards disappeared when Stark picked one, usually they would evaporate instantly.
And so…
~FWISH~
All the cards turned at once, revealing that ALL of them had the same drawing.
The white eyes staring at Stark's soul, as well as the 'EGO' text was visible on all of them.
'Does this mean… my choice didn't make a difference to begin with?' Stark wondered, this wasn't logical.
Or maybe…
"Hey, clone, were the drawings different the last time?" maybe his choice didn't matter to begin with, maybe whatever he picked, he would have gotten the same skill…?
But…
"=)" the clone shook its head, meaning that the previous times, the two other drawings were completely different from the one he had picked.
"Phew…" Stark sighed, it would have been pretty sad to know his choice, even though it was luck, didn't matter.
And so he decided to immediately check out this skill, it was the first time five cards appeared, and also the first time each of them had the same skill behind…
So what could it possibly be…?
[Rank: MYTHICAL]
'…!' Stark's eyes widened, a [Mythical] skill all of a sudden?
Of course, Leader also had his own mythical skill, but it was still fairly new for Stark to get something so powerful just like this, and coincidentally when he reached level 50…
No… it couldn't be a coincidence, maybe every [Domination] user would get a mythical skill once they reached level 50.
In the end, it didn't matter much, as he excitedly looked down to read the description.

chapters.title: Chapter 185 - 185: EGO, The Mythical Skill
chapters.content:
[Skill: EGO]
[Type: MYTHICAL]
[Description:] You shall not know until the time is right.
[Note:] Your ego is increasing…
...
"…" Stark was confused, no description, and the note only made it weirder.
What the hell is an 'EGO', and why is it increasing?
But… the weirdest thing of all… was the small bar below the skill panel.
[EGO Meter: 0%]
This was all the info he had.
Were all mythical skills like that? Is the user supposed to figure it out on his own, since they are way too overpowered? Or maybe it's only for Stark…?
In the end, it didn't really matter much, and so Stark moved to the next panel, maybe that EGO thing would increase later.
'Alright…' he looked to his left, and the next panel was…
[Congratulations, you have killed another player, thus completing the offer that had been given to you! WOOHOO!]
[You have earned the 'MURDERER' title!]
'…' Stark looked at those panels as they appeared with the blankest of expressions.
[You now get your MAP back!]
And the moment it said that, all the panel faded away, replaced by a giant one that looked like a map of the third sublevel.
It was a view from above, almost as if given by satellite, and Stark was marked by a small flashing red dot.
Every passageway, dead end, and turn was clearly marked on the map. But there was something else too – a golden arrow pointing towards the exit, marked by a blinking green dot.
It wasn't very far from his location, actually only five turns, and he would be there, yet it would have probably taken him hours if he didn't have that map now.
'So useful…' he couldn't believe the others had that while he was stuck with himself, his clone, and his pure instinct alone to figure out where he needed to go.
[As part of the offer, you also get TWO rewards from the 'Kill Perk' instead of one! Good job!]
'Finally…'
[Would you like to unlock your rewards now?]
[Y/N?]
'Yeah.'
[Spin the wheels then, participant!]
He had already done it once before to get the [Revive Token], but this time, two giant wheels appeared before him, both had the weird demon horns on top of them, and their auras was overwhelming.
"…"
[Pull the tails!]
Just like before, two demon tails emerged from beside the wheels, urging Stark to pull them both at the same time.
'Killing Spree is unlocked…'
When he first spun his wheel, that section was chained, but now that Leader was dead, it meant that only five participants remained: Kokoro, the white haired lady, Akira, Yuri, and himself.
And so…
[The 'Killing Spree' reward has been unlocked as promised, since only five participants remain!]
In retrospective, it would surely make you think: 10 people alive at the start, and now only 5.
But… Stark didn't care much about that.
~GRAB, FWISH~
He grabbed both demon tails at the same time, then pulled them both, resulting in both wheels spinning at the same time.
[Good luck!]
~FWISH, FWISH, FWISH~
The wheels began to spin at intense speed, hovering over every perk available.
Stark saw the arrows point at the different perks available, all 10 of them were extremely good, but it was obvious some were better than others.
~BIP, BIP~
It would make a rather pleasing sound after passing each section.
And… after thirty seconds…
~BIP… BIP... BIP…~
It began to gradually slow down, then both wheels suddenly stopped, landing on their respective rewards.
And they were…
[Reward: Key Location Map]
[Reward: Killing Spree]
"Oh nice, so I got the 'Key Location Map' and 'Killing Spr-', WAIT WHAT?"
Stark immediately looked onto the descriptions.
[Key Location Map: You will receive a map that shows you which exact monster holds the key that will allow the group to head to the next level]
He already knew this one, but he couldn't deny this was probably one of the best rewards.
And the second reward he had gotten, the best reward of them all… the one with only a 1/10 chance to get it after five people had died… was [Killing Spree].
[Killing Spree: This reward charges up a destructive power that increases after each monster/enemy defeated, the more monsters killed, and the strongest they are, the more this attack's power increases, also note that the amount of monsters killed counts since the beginning of the trial!]
'Doesn't even seem that good in comparison to [Revive Token] or some other ones, though…'
But as if to shut him up…
[With enough monsters killed, you will be able to instantly kill the warden in one blow…]
"Oh," Stark was actually surprised, being able to defeat the final boss of this trial in one attack seemed impossible, but if even whatever was controlling all of it said it, then it must be true… it never lied after all.
[Killing Spree: You have slain 64 monsters inside of this trial, the power of the perk is massive, but only use it when necessary!]
'I guess that's all of it for now…' he didn't even need to put his rewards inside his [Spatial Inventory] since none of them were actually physical: [Key Location Map] just showed the dot of the monster which held the key, while killing spree only counted the monsters in a panel.
'Next panel…' he moved his gaze to the right, and this time…
[Survey: do you realize that your life is only ever going to be full of suffering and torture?]
[Y/N]
'Of course, already knew that,' he pressed on the Y option without hesitation, these survey questions were getting weirder and weirder, but for the second time, Stark couldn't shake off the feeling that these would be important later.
[Thank you for the answer, see you later for the next survey =)]
'Only two more panels,' Stark thought as he turned his head to the right for the hundredth time, probably.
[You have reached level 50, you can now initiate the 'breakthrough' sequence to increase the skill level limit from 15 to 25 (Silver-Tier)!]
[You need a "Breakthrough Stone (Bronze-Tier)" to ascend to Silver-Tier though!]
'Oh yeah… that thing…' the first time it happened was during level 25, and it basically increased his skill level limit from 10 to 15, but this time it was from 15 to 25, making it much better.
Stark noted at the back of his head that he would need to buy a breakthrough stone (which were all pretty damn expensive) for later.
And these were pretty much all the panels Stark had to go through, quite a big amount of them, but it was expected after reaching level 50!
'…'
Looks like it's time to go back out there, as he had his map, meaning he could easily find the exit.
"…"
No…
"…"
Something's missing…
"…"
And so as expected, once Stark turned his eyes again… he saw a giant panel, at least ten times his size, in front of him.
[You have reached level 50, you already know what that means…]
Stark's heart raced with anticipation as he read those words.
"Class Wheel!" he shouted, he didn't know why he did, but it just felt right.
And so… the giant colorful wheel appeared, the same size of the panel that was previously there.
[8 classes available, spin the wheel!]
[Pull me!]
Stark didn't want to waste a single second, so he immediately reached for the also now giant lever that was beside the wheel and used his two hands to pull it down.
Yet again… the wheel began to spin, announcing that Stark's fate would yet again change, for better… or for worse.

chapters.title: Chapter 186 - 186: Third Class and... Merging?
chapters.content:
[8 Classes Available: Warrior, Archer, Exorcist, Soul Wielder, Incubus, Assassin, Beast Tamer, Magus]
As the wheel spun at an intense speed, Stark couldn't help but feel a mix of excitement and anxiety.
He wondered which class he would end up with at level 50.
He first got [Domination] at level 1, which had been a lifesaver since it was what made him so strong even though it brought just as much trouble.
Then he got [Alchemist] at level 25, and although this class wasn't specifically of the 'fighting type', it still helped him as a permanent passive since he could make and drink potions whenever he wanted to aid him: he also would be able to sell those very same potions later at a fair price, increasing his net worth.
And now… he was level 50, meaning that he would get another class.
And so after what felt like an eternity, the wheel finally came to a stop, revealing his destiny.
[You have been chosen as…]
The message on the screen hesitated for a moment before it continued.
[An…]
Stark's breath caught in his throat as he read the next word.
[An Exorcist!]
And just as it said, the giant red arrow at the top of the wheel had landed on the [Exorcist] class.
[Congratulations! You have unlocked the class: Exorcist!]
'Oh…' Stark's clone had stopped whatever it was doing and went beside the original, reading the screen as well.
"…" strangely enough, it wasn't smiling anymore.
It was the first time it didn't have that giant =) on its face, which made it infinitely creepier as to why it suddenly changed like that.
[You can spin the wheel again at level 75!]
Not wanting to waste more time as the others must already be on the verge of finding the key by now, Stark checked out the class's description.
…
[Class: Exorcist]
[Description:] Specialists in banishing evil/cursed spirits and curses, possessing abilities to purify their surroundings and protect others from malevolent forces (mainly fight demons and use divine power)
[Class Effect:] Holy aura surrounds you, and demon-type monsters are much weaker when facing you.
[Class Flaw:] Strong against demons, ghosts, and cursed monsters, but pretty weak against the others.
[Basic Skills:] You do not need any, Domination has already absorbed it.
…
'Interesting-' Stark nodded, it wasn't much different from Alchemist in terms of presentation , "WAIT WHAT?"
He read the last panel again, the one with the basic skills, and… there were no skills?
"Domination has already absorbed it?" Stark was confused, it didn't even make sense.
And yet… he somehow had a really bad feeling about it… no… the feeling wasn't bad… it was just… uncomfortable?
"…=)" Stark's clone began to gradually smile again.
And after less than a minute… something else appeared in front of Stark, something… completely out of this world.
[We do not need to burden ourselves with such a class… =)]
'…?'
[Exorcist is an interesting class, but it is too weak, meaning that it would be easily forgotten if not used against demons, and even then…]
'…!' Stark's eyes gradually widened.
[So… why not absorb it… comrade =)?]
'What do you mean-'
[Domination is currently absorbing the 'Exorcist' class…]
[Do not resist it, it is a process that will make US stronger]
'THIS IS… WHAT?' Stark was actually astonished, he couldn't understand anything that was happening.
Absorbing the [Exorcist] class since it isn't convenient? Doesn't that mean that [Domination] would basically become much stronger by absorbing the powers of the [Exorcist] class? And if so, then would he get skills related to it…?
Stark's pupils were shaking, the uncomfortable feeling wasn't leaving, it was just increasing by the second, slowly turning into dread at the face of the unknown.
"=)" the clone just stood there though, it looked like it already knew what was about to happen.
But after yet another minute…
[100/100]
[Absorption complete!]
[The 'Domination' class has absorbed the 'Exorcist' class, thus inheriting its aura and powers!]
[Basically… Exorcist has become part of Domination, it didn't disappear, it is still with us, but we just made it so that it is easier to use…]
And with this information out of the way, all the panels disappeared, and no matter how much Stark waited, no more appeared: this was everything.
'STATUS WINDOW,' he shouted in his mind.
…
[Level:] 52
[Health:] 6300/24900
[Bloodline:] Human
[Classes:] Domination; Alchemist; Exorcist (Absorbed by Domination).
[Note: A class that is absorbed by Domination doesn't disappear, it just becomes part of Domination as a whole, meaning you can still use its powers, but they become much stronger as Domination enhances them!]
[Talent:] Chosen one
[Attributes:] Strength 3392; Speed 4149; Mind/Soul 3987; Stamina 3590; Defense 3493
[Skills:] Spatial Inventory; Class Wheel; Perception; Domination lv15; Focus lv15; Aura Smash lv10; Clone Frenzy lv15; Invincible Dodge lv5; Double Assault lv5; Crimson Spears lv1; Heaven's Wrath lv5; Alchemist lv3; Potion Crafting lv3; Target Manipulation lv1; Dodge Control lv1; Crimson Ball Transmission lv1; EGO lv1 (Mythical)…
…
Exorcist was still showing, but beside it was a small text saying that it was already absorbed by Domination.
[As Exorcist has been absorbed, you have been granted one skill!]
'…?' Stark didn't even have the time to think that it appeared before him.
…
[Skill: Crimson Purification]
[Tier: Legendary]
[Description: A divine ability that eradicates evil and impurities from the surrounding area, dealing massive damage to demonic and cursed enemies while increasing the Holy aura, making you stronger against these types of foes. However, it has no effect on other types of enemies.]
[Note: 10 minutes cooldown between each use]
…
Everything was going so fast: he got his new class, but apparently it would be useless under normal circumstances, so Domination had absorbed it to make it more powerful, and now he got a skill that merged both [Domination] and [Exorcist] into one…?
At first, it didn't seem to make much sense: the Exorcist class was primarily used against demons, so people who had it were mainly dispatched to rifts where these beings resided, however, now that it had been absorbed by Domination, the holy aura and attacks would be strong even against regular enemies, or at least that is what he thought.
[Domination X Exorcist is now active, have fun!]
'Oh well… I'll just think about it later…' he turned his gaze toward his clone, and immediately, his eyes widened.
Usually, the [Superior Clone] would only be made out of crimson aura, only its eyes and mouth made out of white one, but now…
"=)" there were now some strands of golden aura in the body of the clone, and its eyes had reversed crimson crosses in them, shining with red aura.
Basically… it finally hit Stark that Exorcist had actually merged with Domination.
And the most interesting of all… was that his aura had also changed, the golden strands visible in it too, making it much more 'holy'.
[You can spin the 'Class Wheel' again at level 75]
"That's incredible," Stark smiled, "But I need to move, so the last thing I need to do is just… use my skill points."
And so Stark opened his skill panel again, he had 22 skill points available, and he would make sure to use them well.
Did all of this make sense to him? Would it even matter in the future?
Frankly, Stark didn't know, and all he could see in his field of view was the giant smile of the now [Holy Superior Clone], much more sadistic than before, as if absorbing [Exorcist] made it more evil than before (although it should be the opposite).
'Sigh… I don't know, let's just get this over with,' and so he picked the skills he wanted to upgrade.

chapters.title: Chapter 187 - 187: The Big Upgrades and Perks
chapters.content:
[Skill Points: 22 Available!]
Stark poured all of his focus onto the skill panel, wanting to upgrade THE skills that he thought would be best at this very moment.
No one knew what awaited them at the following floors, and there was no saying if he would need to fight someone else: they only went up two floors, yet five of them had died.
At this rate… only 2… no… only 1 person would live to see the warden.
…
[Skills:] Spatial Inventory; Class Wheel; Perception; Domination lv15; Focus lv15; Aura Smash lv10; Clone Frenzy lv15; Invincible Dodge lv5; Double Assault lv5; Crimson Spears lv1; Heaven's Wrath lv5; Alchemist lv3; Potion Crafting lv3; Target Manipulation lv1; Dodge Control lv1; Crimson Ball Transmission lv1; EGO lv1; Crimson Purification lv1
…
These were all the skills he had, and to be honest there was starting to be a huge amount of them.
If he got too many, he would surely abandon some of these skills to use stronger ones, which was what other people must do, as it is impossible to take every skill into account in a battle.
Somehow… for some strange reason… Stark didn't like it, but he shouldn't be bothered by it for now, so he quickly moved on.
'Hm…' although he wanted to do it fast, he also wanted to choose wisely, rushing and picking a bad skill in this situation to upgrade was like asking for death.
And so after two minutes of deep thinking…
"Alright, got it all," he selected all the skills he wanted and assign the amount of skill points to them.
[You have upgraded 'Invincible Dodge' to level 10!]
[You have upgraded 'Double Assault' to level 10!]
[You have upgraded 'Dodge Control' to level 5!]
[You have upgraded 'Alchemist' to level 5!]
[You have upgraded 'EGO' to level 5!]
Stark decided to go for the safe options this time, as these were all skills he was guaranteed to use, except for [EGO] but it was a mythical skill so it would be dumb not to upgrade it, as well as [Alchemist] since he had two skill points left, and it was at level 3, so why not.
And of course, upgrading 5 skills to their threshold could only mean one thing… PERKS!
~DING, DING, DING, DING, DING~
Five panels surrounded Stark, and he began reading them to assimilate the new perks he was getting, it was always good to know even if you couldn't test them out after all.
…
[Skill: Invincible Dodge lv10]
[New Perk: Combo Dodge]
[Description:] If many attacks are coming your way, you are able to continuously dodge them in opposition to being able to only dodge once, the limit is 10 dodges currently though.
[Note:] Basically, if someone attacks you 10 times, then as long as it is continuous within a short time, then you will be able to avoid all the attacks by fazing through them (as long as you have the right timing of course)
If you do dodge an attack and no attack comes after a second, then the [Invincible Dodge] combo will be considered over, and you will have to wait a minute to use the skill again, as per usual.
…
'Interesting… so I can dodge 10 attacks one after another as long as there is less than 1 second between each of them…' Stark was already happy as this meant being able to avoid many attacks at once, it almost fucked him up many times before after all, 'Next…'
…
[Skill: Double Assault lv10]
[New Perk: Increased Usage]
[Description:] You can use Double Assault for 20 seconds instead of 10, that's all.
…
'Fair,' Stark shrugged, it was incredibly good, and there was nothing much to say about it either, so he just moved on.
…
[Skill: Dodge Control lv5]
[New Perk: Semi-Control]
[Description:] When you activate this skill, your aura completely takes over your body, thus meaning you cannot control it whenever it is dodging, but thanks to this perk, you have regained a bit of control while dodging, meaning that by trying hard enough, you can dodge all attacks while also lending some good hits (you still can't use any other skill while Dodge Control is active though…)
…
'I do remember the feeling of not controlling my body, and the fact I can't use skills while it is active sure is annoying, but hopefully it will slowly and slowly give me back the control, so I can do everything while dodging…' Stark nodded in approval, and his clone kept smiling, it seemed joyful the more perks it was getting… wait no, not it, but Stark… obviously, right?
"=)"
…
[Skill: Alchemist lv5]
[New Perk: None]
[Description:] You can just craft potions that require this skill level, that's all.
…
This skill was completely passive and mostly for potion crafting, so it was completely normal.
Thus… Stark moved to the last skill, the one he had been waiting for the most: EGO, the mythical skill.
…
[Skill: EGO]
[New Perk: EGO EGO]
[Description: Your ego is… never mind, just keep increasing it]
[EGO Meter: 0]
…
"…" Stark was hesitating between calling it a scam or something great that he would surely discover later, but as expected, he got no information on this skill, it was so bad even the description of the skill itself looked like it hesitated to tell him, "Oh well," he just shrugged.
With that out of the way, he had done everything that needed to be done concerning the fact he reached level 50, and he felt great about it: new class (although it was absorbed by Domination), new skills, new perks, all in all it was good.
'Alright, need to reach the second sublevel now,' Stark opened up his mouth and began to follow it, rapidly turning over the corners and checking where the red dot (him) was compared to where the green one (the exit) was.
And so after less than three minutes… he arrived in front of a silver door that was already opened.
'Quick, quick,' he didn't waste time and began to climb the spiral of stairs that would lead him to the second sublevel.
And so after a minute, he could see the entrance of the floor, the silver door in front of him already opened, but impossible to see inside because of the light beyond it.
